slides.title: cleaver
slides.subtitle: the simple way to generate static HTML slideshows

slides.title: What is Cleaver?
slides.content:
**Cleaver** is the simplest way to generate
        static HTML presentations from a simple
        JSON format.>>

        Conveniently-packed in a node command-line
        application, `cleaver` makes it easy to
        create presentations, and makes them
        portable. Adding your own styles can be
        done in seconds.

slides.title: The code?
slides.content:
The source code to **cleaver** is freely
        available [on GitHub](http://github.com/prezjordan/cleaver).
        >>

        If you're curious to see the code used
        to generate these slides,
        [here's a gist](https://gist.github.com/3847019).
